name: Farm and Click - Idle Farming
description:
Do you like farm games? Now you can play a game that's all about farming and fun!

Forget about endless instructions and dealing with the problems of everyday life! Dive into a farming simulator that's all about the one thing that really matters - farming!

Plant crops, raise barnyard animals and upgrade equipment to produce even more crops and animals! Develop your strategy to collect all types of animals and veggies!

WHY IS FRIENDLY FARM SO AWESOME?
- It's all about fun!
- You can collect wild creatures like dragons and mammoths!
- Farming simulators have never been easier to learn!
- Awesome art and animation!
- It's a new generation of idle-clicker!

So prepare yourself to swipe your way to fun! Play Friendly Farm!
